description: Treat loved ones this festive season to a tender roast leg of lamb with juicy tomatoes and a refreshing pea and feta side salad.
keywords: Roast Leg of Lamb With Tomatoes
name: Roast Leg of Lamb With Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make pea salad, combine lettuce, peas, feta and mint in a bowl. Drizzle with reserved oil and season. Cut remaining lemon into cheeks. Drizzle remaining marinade over lamb. Serve with lemon cheeks and salad.
